chapter.title: ECTester Setup
chapter.para: This chapter discusses system requirements and ECTester setup on Linux. Windows Setup will be similar to Linux.

section.title: Requirements
section.para: ECTester is a Java based application. Java NNN is required to build and run the program. You should install the Java NNN SDK to install the Java compiler and other SDK tools. In addition you should install ant package.
Native Libraries testing requires common build tools, like make, a C or C++ compiler, an assembler, and a linker. You may also need Autotools like autoconf and automake, depending on the library.
On Debian and derivatives you can install the build-essentials package. On Red Hat systems, like CentOS and Fedora, you should install the gcc, gcc-c++, make, autoconf and automake packages.
